contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|veldt}} '''Veldt''' may refer to: * [[Veld]] (also spelt Veldt), a term used to define certain wide open rural spaces of Southern Africa * [[The Veldt (short story)|"The Veldt" (short story)]], a 1950 short story written by Ray Bradbury * [[The Veldt (song)|"The Veldt" (song)]], a 2012 song by Canadian electronic music producer deadmau5 * [[Veldt Township, Marshall County, Minnesota|Veldt Township]], a township in Marshall County, Minnesota, United States * The [[Veldt (Final Fantasy)]], a large flatland in the video game ''Final Fantasy VI'' where the characters can fight most previously encountered enemies * [[Tim Veldt]] (born 1984), Dutch cyclist {{disambiguation|surname}}
